divs: Sighting Detailscan you email me with an answer? these 2 discs have been jetting, dicing all over the sky just above me for 5+hours now and there are two planes whose wingspans are pretty wide yet thin as pencils who have been circling the exact same area for the same amount of time with the exception of about an hour maybe to refuel. im always looking at the sky as the whole back wall of my apt is windows & ive never seen planes like these not have i seen things that look like discs. the discs are cutting left & right like bees yet are staying at what seems to be the exact same altitude. any thoughts?
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Souderton
There were no other sightings in Souderton on or around May 25th 2008
Summary: 2 of them that appear to be black
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
